Looking up at the western wall of the Purple Tenuity Palace, in its northwest corner, he saw an inscribed jade slip named *The Chapter of the Five-Colored Radiant Lads*. When the preceding is complete, visualize the five colors blending into yellow, layering and intensifying upon one another. Cloud-qi surges and billows, filling the entire chamber and coiling around your body. Feel your form suffused with warmth, heat radiating within and without, penetrating deeply for a long while. Then behold: a Green Dragon upon your left shoulder, a White Tiger upon your right, a Vermilion Phoenix above your head, and a Soaring Serpent beneath your feet. They crown your body and recite the incantation:

*"The five colors thicken and surge—white, black, red, and blue-green. From the Central Mystery they descend, merging in dark abundance. Transformed into celestial beasts, they come to guard my form. Bestow upon me the Five Mushrooms, filling my five viscera to abundance. The Crimson Palace knits its networks, and divine radiance arises of itself. My lifespan equals sun and moon, ever preserving Yellow Tranquility. Through a thousand transformations and ten thousand changes, I shall ascend to the Supreme Numinous."*

**Method for Swallowing Saliva, Restoring Countenance, and Securing Teeth to Seek Immortality**

At the break of dawn, when the two qi have not yet divided and the dark radiance has just illuminated the world, when form and spirit descend together to gather at the Muddy Pellet Palace, essence and fluids are all generated. This is the time to swallow and ingest them. After three years of such practice, your face will glow with jade-like luster, your complexion will revert to youth, your cloud-like vitality will take root, and decayed teeth will regrow.

If you persist in this cultivation, the Five Elders will descend to your chamber. You will ascend as a divine immortal, your lifespan equaling the Three Luminaries. This is the Way of Undying—transmit it only to the true.

At the appointed time, calm your mind and settle your intent, allowing the Five Spirits to attain stillness. Knock the teeth twelve times, then visualize the Azure-Robed Jade Maiden bearing the Lesser Yang qi of the East, along with Azure Mushroom and Jade Nectar, irrigating your body. Let them flow and overflow within the Purple Tenuity Palace, and recite:

*"Eastern Bluegreen Fang, drink the morning radiance. Jade nectar and sweet springs pour forth in torrents, streaming to moisten the Six Palaces. Dark influx flows like a river. My body grows strong, my form light, ascending to grasp the Supreme Rosy Clouds."*

When finished, lick the outer side of your upper teeth nine times and swallow.

Next, visualize the Vermilion-Robed Jade Maiden of the South bearing the Great Yang qi, along with Crimson Mushroom and Jade Nectar, irrigating your body. Let them flow and overflow within the Crimson Palace, and recite:

*"Southern Red Fang, drink the sweet springs. Dark mushroom and jade nectar flow and overflow like rivers, further moistening the Crimson Palace. My bones transform and give birth to spirits. I feast upon the Great Void, my entire body becoming immortal. Riding clouds and driving the dawn, I ascend before the Emperor."*

When finished, lick the outer side of your lower teeth eight times and swallow.

Next, visualize the Pristine Jade Maiden of the West bearing the Lesser Yin qi, along with White Mushroom and Jade Nectar, irrigating your body. Let them flow and overflow within the Canopy Palace, and recite:

*"Western White Fang, drink the numinous fluid. Jade waters surge in mighty currents, dark mushrooms gleaming brightly. They irrigate my Six Palaces, anchoring my hun and solidifying my po. My spirit is at peace, my stomach and ducts secure. My name is inscribed in the Golden Register."*

When finished, lick the inner side of your upper teeth six times and swallow.

Next, visualize the Jade Maiden of the North bearing the Great Yin qi, along with Dark Mushroom and Jade Water, irrigating your body. Let them flow and overflow within the Great Granary Palace, and recite:

*"Northern Black Fang, consume the dark nourishment. Drink my flying springs, feed me jade broth. My divine palace fills to overflowing, like cinnabar, like mushrooms. My lifespan overturns heaven and earth, shared by millions for countless ages."*

When finished, lick the inner side of your lower teeth five times and swallow.

Next, visualize the Yellow-Robed Jade Maiden of the Center bearing the Harmonious qi, along with Yellow Water and Moon Essence Elixir, irrigating your body. Let them flow and overflow within the Jade Hall, and recite:

*"Central Yellow Fang, white stones towering high. Feast upon the jade broth’s elixir, slake your thirst with Yellow Water and Moon Essence. My five viscera fill to abundance, streaming and moistening like rivers. My lifespan equals the Three Luminaries, never to decline or perish. My form ascends the Nine Mysteries, riding dragons and soaring through rosy clouds."*

When finished, lick all four sides of your upper and lower teeth, then press your tongue against the Mysterious Flower and draw the mushroom fluid twelve times before swallowing.

**The Way of Swallowing Saliva to Preserve the Teeth**

The Central Yellow Venerable Lord and the Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate constantly practiced this method. Their complexions became like those of youths, their skin like jade, their bodies brimming with qi. Their white hair turned black again, their teeth took root and never decayed or fell out. Thus they attained the descent of the Mysterious, their names inscribed in the Jade Registers. They ascended to the Clear Void, sharing the Emperor’s seat.

If you cultivate this, you shall seek your name in the Jade Pavilion of the Golden Gates. Without immortal records, you may not unseal and reveal it.

**Method for Riding Rosy Clouds, Descending Mist, and Ascending the Void**

Transmitted by the Azure Lad

The Lord of the Empyrean was born within luminous rosy clouds, enveloped by the five clouds, his countenance suffused with empyrean qi. His form follows the imperial registers, and he received the title Jade Tenuity. Concentrating the true and solidifying the fluids, he contemplates the dark rosy clouds to set himself in motion, yearning to roam the empyrean and ascend the void. He rides the dark dawn through the Ten Heavens, galloping like lightning to rein in the dragons. Thus, through focused contemplation, he achieves perfection and ascends the void to enter non-being.

The essentials of this method are pure and unadulterated by other techniques. I now transmit it to you—you may practice it accordingly.

The Eastern Rosy Cloud is named *Flying Void*.
The Western Rosy Cloud is named *Pristine Hut*.
The Southern Rosy Cloud is named *Cinnabar Radiance*.
The Northern Rosy Cloud is named *Dark Image*.
The Central Rosy Cloud is named *Encompassing Life*.

If you know the five rosy clouds, they will descend and summon the flying chariots. Contemplate them morning and evening, and the dark empyrean will come to invite you. Riding the void, you will ascend and reach the Supreme Clarity.

To practice this method, at the first light of dawn, go to the central courtyard. Knock your teeth sixteen times, then face east and call the names of the five directional rosy clouds three times each. When finished, look up and recite:

*"Five Directions’ Dark Rosy Clouds, streaming and illuminating the Dark Void. Three and seven ride nine, returning to encircle my hut. Grant me the flying dawn, to rein in the purple chariot. Ascending to the Supreme Ultimate, I request the true scriptures."*

When finished, bow in reverence and swallow qi thirty-six times.

At dusk, face west and perform the same method.

Those who cultivate the Supreme Way yet do not know the inner names of the cloud chariots will find that the cloud carriages do not descend for them, and their contemplation will not evoke a response. If you obtain this method and practice it for eighteen years, the qi of self-generating clouds will form within your chamber, and the cloud chariots will descend to carry your body upward to the Jade Clarity.

This Dao treasure is profoundly secret. The text speaks of the hidden names of the radiant clouds, which worldly people must never learn or practice—thus it must be kept concealed. To carelessly reveal it brings sin upon oneself, calamity upon seven generations. How could one not be cautious?

**Method for Moving Through the Celestial Pass and Unfolding the Divine Wondrous Observation of Secret Writ**

The Perfected Sovereign said: If you wish to ascend and soar to the Golden Gates, you must cultivate the Wondrous Observation, move through the Celestial Pass, pay homage to your parents, and inwardly invoke the true spirits. Then you may wander and play among the Nine Heavens, ascending to the Emperor’s chamber.

At midnight, step barefoot into the central courtyard. Gazing upward, visualize the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper shining brightly. Envision your body standing at the Dipper’s center, revolving with it as it moves through the Celestial Pass. When it reaches the position above the southwest, bow twice, stand upright, and knock your head upon the ground nine times. Then, lifting your head slightly, softly call out three times:

*"Heavenly Father, Earthly Mother, I now return my body, restoring it to its natural honor in your care. Will you not move and deliver me? Once my body is delivered, I shall forever depart the paths of mortal thought. Contemplating the two honored ones, I reverently receive your blessed destiny."*

When finished, swallow qi twice, then swallow saliva nine times.

These two honored ones are the most sacred names of Heaven and Earth, the hidden appellations of the Mysterious True. They must never be recklessly disclosed to others. Should one reveal them three times, the officials of the Nine Heavens will diminish one’s lifespan and cut short one’s years, casting one’s life into the Nine Springs—forever barring ascent to immortality.

For those who cultivate the Way of the Supreme True: if the Seven Stars shift their position and you open the Three Celestial Passes, yet do not know these names, the Jade Perfected of the Nine Heavens will block the resonance of your contemplation. Those who are not children of the Mysterious Gate cannot unfold this method, and the true spirits will not descend for them.

This is the wondrous method of Heaven and Earth. The recipient must present a golden figurine and a jade figurine, each one in form, to the master, and receive the oral transmission of the decisive instructions. Then, ascending the altar, they must swear an oath of initiation, never violating the precepts. Should one transgress, their body will be seized by the ghostly officials, and calamity will extend to the seven ancestral lines. The recipient must be cautious—most cautious indeed.

Here ends the *Scripture of the Supreme Wondrous, Purple Passage, Blazing Radiance, and Divine Transformation of the Cavernous True*.
